verses.t: The elders{G4245} which{G3588} are among{G1722} you{G5213} I exhort{G3870}, who{G3588} am also an elder{G4850}, and{G2532} a witness{G3144} of the sufferings{G3804} of Christ{G3588}, and also{G2532} a partaker{G2844} of the glory{G1391} that shall{G3195} be revealed{G601}:

Feed{G4165} the flock{G4168} of God{G3588} which is among{G1722} you{G5213}, taking the oversight{G1983} thereof, not{G3361} by constraint{G317}, but{G235} willingly{G1596}; not{G3366} for filthy lucre{G147}, but{G235} of a ready mind{G4290};
Neither{G3366} as{G5613} being lords over{G2634} God's heritage{G3588}, but{G235} being{G1096} ensamples{G5179} to the flock{G3588}.
And when{G2532} the chief Shepherd{G3588} shall appear{G5319}, ye shall receive{G2865} a crown{G4735} of glory{G3588} that fadeth not away{G262}.

Likewise{G3668}, ye younger{G3501}, submit{G5293} yourselves{G240} unto the elder{G4245}. Yea{G1161}, all{G3956} of you be subject one to another{G5293}, and be clothed with{G1463} humility{G3588}: for{G3754} God{G3588} resisteth{G498} the proud{G5244}, and{G1161} giveth{G1325} grace{G5485} to the humble{G5011}.
Humble yourselves{G5013} therefore{G3767} under{G5259} the mighty{G2900} hand{G5495} of God{G3588}, that{G2443} he may exalt{G5312} you{G5209} in{G1722} due time{G2540}:
Casting{G1977} all{G3956} your{G5216} care{G3588} upon{G1909} him{G846}; for{G3754} he{G846} careth{G3199} for{G4012} you{G5216}.

Be sober{G3525}, be vigilant{G1127}; because{G3754} your{G5216} adversary{G3588} the devil{G1228}, as{G5613} a roaring{G5612} lion{G3023}, walketh about{G4043}, seeking{G2212} whom{G5101} he may devour{G2666}:

Whom{G3739} resist{G436} stedfast{G4731} in the faith{G3588}, knowing that{G1492} the same{G846} afflictions{G3588} are accomplished{G2005} in your{G5216} brethren{G81} that are in{G1722} the world{G2889}.

But{G1161} the God{G2316} of all{G3956} grace{G5485}, who{G3588} hath called{G2564} us{G2248} unto{G1519} his{G846} eternal{G166} glory{G1391} by{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}, after that ye have suffered{G3958} a while{G3641}, make{G2675} you{G5209} perfect{G2675}, stablish{G4741}, strengthen{G4599}, settle{G2311} you.Not sure where to place the tag for autos. There is no English word to go with it.
To him{G846} be glory{G3588} and{G2532} dominion{G3588} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}. Amen{G281}.

By{G1223} Silvanus{G4610}, a faithful{G4103} brother{G80} unto you{G5213}, as{G5613} I suppose{G3049}, I have written{G1125} briefly{G3641}, exhorting{G3870}, and{G2532} testifying{G1957} that this{G3778} is{G1511} the true{G227} grace{G5485} of God{G3588} wherein{G1519} ye stand{G2476}."wherein" translates eis hn. Not sure where to place tag for hn. Not sure about placement of tag for di. There is no corresponding English word.
The{G3588} church that is at{G1722} Babylon{G897}, elected together with{G4899} you, saluteth{G782} you{G5209}; and{G2532} so doth Marcus{G3138} my{G3450} son{G3588}.
Greet ye{G782} one another{G240} with{G1722} a kiss{G5370} of charity{G26}. Peace{G1515} be with you{G5213} all{G3956} that{G3588} are in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}. Amen{G281}.
